channel.title: Xen
channel.description: I know it may be too early to ask this, but I have loved Black Mesa so far and am getting ready for more. Does anyone have information on when the Xen levels will be out. (Also, if you devs are reading this, I would personally prefer you release Xen before the deathmatch. Who am I kidding, you are probably going to do what I just said anyway.) Good job BM team and keep up the good work. :freeman:

item.description:
There is already a Xen thread. Full of developer quotes on release.

Read full topic

item.title: Xen
item.dc:creator: MaximusPM
item.description:
Probably not in this decade, but hey, it’s probably going to be awesome. The mod so far has been worth the long wait.

Read full topic
